title: Oxford University to explore if AI can help cancer treatment
description: Oxford University researchers will explore if artificial intelligence (AI) can help doctors make better decisions when it comes to prostate cancer.
content:
The study will compare how well the predictions made by the AI tool match what happened to patients in the real world.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - India is shaping the global AI framework that is ethical and human-centric: PM Modi.
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. title: Asian Markets Surge Amid U.S.-China Trade Truce and AI Investment Boom
description: Asian stock markets rose on Monday due to a trade truce between the U.S. and China along with increased investment in artificial intelligence. Despite optimism, doubts persist on whether the trade agreement will hold. Investors focus on economic developments, central bank actions, and upcoming earnings reports from tech firms.
